name: Sad Hill Cemetery
description:
A Quickdraw game for PS Move

Also for keyboard - but the move version is way cooler!

Vote for us on Greenlight!


It's High Noon Somewhere

Grab a friend and enter an old school western stand off. You can fire when the church bell stops tolling - but neither of you know what time it is.

Now you can play something other than JS Joust with those move controllers you bought!


The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

The game can be played using keyboard as well as PS Move controllers.

If using PS Move, Mac is recommended. Linux is untested and pairing controllers on Windows is difficult due to limitations of the bluetooth API.


How to Connect Controllers
  1. If you have a copy of Sportsfriends - simply use that!
  1. Download the psmoveapi
  2. Run the build script
  3. Turn on controllers and pair them
  4. Run Sad Hill Cemetery!
